name: Phineas and Ferb: Candace Saves the Day
name_original: Phineas and Ferb: Candace Saves the Day
description:
With Phineas, Ferb, and Agent P all missing, it's Candace's time to shine in this 2D-platforming journey across Danville.

Controls:

Move - Arrow Keys

Jump - Space Bar

Talk to NPCs - X

Shoot Projectiles - Z (not available at start of game)
